item.text: Rehoboam traveled to Shechem, for all Israel had gathered in Shechem to make Rehoboam king.

<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01961" class="">When</st> <st data-num="03379" class="">Jeroboam</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05028" class="">Nebat</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> the news, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="05750" class="">still</st> in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> he had <st data-num="01272" class="">fled</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> and had been <st data-num="03427 03379">living</st> <st data-num="04714" class="">ever since</st>.<n id="2" />

They <st data-num="07971 07121">sent for</st> him,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03379" class="">Jeroboam</st> and the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="06951" class="">assembly</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07346" class="">Rehoboam</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>,

“Your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="07185" class="">made</st> us <st data-num="05923" class="">work</st> <st data-num="07185" class="">too hard</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> if <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="07043" class="">lighten</st> the <st data-num="05656 07186">demands</st> <st data-num="01" class="">he</st> made and <st data-num="05923 03515">don’t make</st> us <st data-num="05923 03515">work</st> <st data-num="0834 05414 05921">as hard</st>, we will <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> you.”<n id="2" />
He said to them, “Go away for three days, then return to me.” So the people went away.
King Rehoboam consulted with the older advisers who had served his father Solomon when he had been alive. He asked them, “How do you advise me to answer these people?”

They <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="03117" class="">Today</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> you will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> to <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> and <st data-num="05647" class="">grant</st> their <st data-num="06030" class="">request</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01696" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">kind</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them,<n id="2" /> they will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> <st data-num="03605 03117">from this time forward</st>.”<n id="3" />

But Rehoboam <st data-num="05800" class="">rejected</st> <st data-num="02205 0834 03289">their</st> <st data-num="06098" class="">advice</st> and <st data-num="03289" class="">consulted</st> the <st data-num="03206">young advisers</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="05975 06440">served</st> him, <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> he had <st data-num="01431" class="">grown up</st>.<n id="1" />

He <st data-num="0559 0413">asked</st> them, “<st data-num="04100" class="">How</st> do <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="03289" class="">advise</st> me<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="07725 01697">respond</st> to <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me, ‘<st data-num="07043 04480">Lessen</st> the <st data-num="05923 0834">demands</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> us’?”<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="03206" class="">young advisers</st> <st data-num="0834 0854">with whom</st> Rehoboam<n id="1" /> had <st data-num="01431" class="">grown up</st> <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="0559" class="">Say</st> <st data-num="03541" class="">this</st> to <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> have <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you, ‘Your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03513" class="">made</st> us <st data-num="05923" class="">work</st> <st data-num="03513" class="">hard</st>, but now <st data-num="0859 07043">lighten</st> our <st data-num="05921" class="">burden</st>.’<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01696" class="">Say</st> <st data-num="03541" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them: ‘<st data-num="06995" class="">I</st> <st data-num="05666">am</st> a lot <st data-num="05666" class="">harsher</st> than my <st data-num="04975 01">father</st>!<n id="3" />
My father imposed heavy demands on you; I will make them even heavier. My father punished you with ordinary whips; I will punish you with whips that really sting your flesh.’”
Jeroboam and all the people reported to Rehoboam on the third day, just as the king had ordered when he said, “Return to me on the third day.”

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="06030" class="">responded to</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="07186" class="">harshly</st>. He <st data-num="05800" class="">rejected</st> the <st data-num="06098" class="">advice</st> of the <st data-num="02205 0834 03289">older men</st>

and <st data-num="01696 0413">followed</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="06098" class="">advice</st> of the <st data-num="03206" class="">younger ones</st>. He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “My <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03513" class="">imposed heavy</st> <st data-num="05923" class="">demands</st> on you; <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="03254 05921">make</st> <st data-num="05923" class="">them</st> <st data-num="03254 05921">even heavier</st>.<n id="2" /> My <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03256" class="">punished</st> you with <st data-num="07752" class="">ordinary whips</st>; <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="03256" class="">punish</st> you with <st data-num="06137" class="">whips that really sting</st> your <st data-num="06137">flesh</st>.”<n id="3" />

The king refused to listen to the people, because the Lord was instigating this turn of events so that he might bring to pass the prophetic announcement he had made through Ahijah the Shilonite to Jeroboam son of Nebat.

When all Israel saw that the king refused to listen to them, the people answered the king, “We have no portion in David, no share in the son of Jesse! Return to your homes, O Israel! Now, look after your own dynasty, O David!” So Israel returned to their homes.

(<st data-num="07346" class="">Rehoboam</st> continued to <st data-num="04427" class="">rule</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> who <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>.)

<st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="07346" class="">Rehoboam</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="0151" class="">Adoniram</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0834 05921">supervisor of</st> the <st data-num="04522" class="">work crews</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="07971" class="">out</st> after them, but <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="07275 068">stoned</st> him to <st data-num="04191" class="">death</st>. <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="07346" class="">Rehoboam</st> <st data-num="0553" class="">managed</st> to <st data-num="05927" class="">jump</st> into his <st data-num="04818" class="">chariot</st> and <st data-num="05127" class="">escape</st> to <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="3" />

So <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> has <st data-num="06586" class="">been in rebellion</st> against the <st data-num="01732" class="">Davidic</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">dynasty</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.
When all Israel heard that Jeroboam had returned, they summoned him to the assembly and made him king over all Israel. No one except the tribe of Judah remained loyal to the Davidic dynasty.
When Rehoboam arrived in Jerusalem, he summoned 180,000 skilled warriors from all Judah and the tribe of Benjamin to attack Israel and restore the kingdom to Rehoboam son of Solomon.
But <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01961 01697 0413 0559">told</st> <st data-num="08098" class="">Shemaiah</st> the <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet</st>,<n id="1" />

“<st data-num="0559 0559">Say</st> this <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="07346" class="">Rehoboam</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, and <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01004 03063">Judah</st> and <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>, as well as the <st data-num="03499" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>,

‘This is what the Lord has said: “Do not attack and make war with your brothers, the Israelites. Each of you go home. Indeed this thing has happened because of me.”’” So they obeyed the Lord’s message. They went home in keeping with the Lord’s message.
Jeroboam built up Shechem in the Ephraimite hill country and lived there. From there he went out and built up Penuel.

<st data-num="03379" class="">Jeroboam</st> then <st data-num="0559" class="">thought</st> to <st data-num="03820" class="">himself</st>:<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> the <st data-num="01732" class="">Davidic</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">dynasty</st> could <st data-num="07725" class="">regain</st> the <st data-num="04467" class="">kingdom</st>.<n id="2" />

If these people go up to offer sacrifices in the Lord’s temple in Jerusalem, their loyalty could shift to their former master, King Rehoboam of Judah. They might kill me and return to King Rehoboam of Judah.”

After the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> had <st data-num="03289" class="">consulted</st> with his advisers,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">golden</st> <st data-num="05695" class="">calves</st>. Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the people,<n id="2" /> “It is <st data-num="07227" class="">too much</st> trouble for you to <st data-num="05927" class="">go up</st> to <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>. <st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, <st data-num="02009" class="">here</st> are your <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">brought</st> you <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> from the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>.”

He <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> in <st data-num="01008" class="">Bethel</st><n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="0259" class="">other</st> in <st data-num="05414 01835">Dan</st>.
This caused Israel to sin; the people went to Bethel and Dan to worship the calves.
He built temples on the high places and appointed as priests common people who were not Levites.

Jeroboam inaugurated a festival on the fifteenth day of the eighth month, like the festival celebrated in Judah. On the altar in Bethel he offered sacrifices to the calves he had made. In Bethel he also appointed priests for the high places he had made.

On the fifteenth day of the eighth month (a date he had arbitrarily chosen) Jeroboam offered sacrifices on the altar he had made in Bethel. He inaugurated a festival for the Israelites and went up to the altar to offer sacrifices.
